vote.title: Authorize the second step of acquisition for condemnation by eminent domain to acquire from Rickey Wilson, of approximately 4,342 square feet of land located near the intersection of Cleaves and West Levee Streets for The Bottom Revitalization Infrastructure Project - Not to exceed $90,000.00 ($85,000.00, plus closing costs and title expenses not to exceed $5,000.00) - Financing: ECO (I) Fund (2017 General Obligation Bond Fund) ($80,000.00) and Street and Transportation (A) Fund (2017 General Obligation Bond Fund) ($10,000.00)
